channel.title: Help please?
channel.description:
Hey guys, could anyone help me with this;...
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Is the error i'm getting when trying to load ANY of the clients i've downloaded to play Moparscape/Silab's servers.
[ul][li]I have the latest JDK / JAVA[/li] [li]No, I don't have a rubbish computer.[/li] [li]Yes, i'm after help. [/li] [li]DO NOT tell me to go to the Webclient, because that doesn't even work either![/li][/ul]
Help please? It'd be great to get back to playing Mopar after a 3 month break!

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

no problem im here to help

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

I’ll give it a few minutes, see what happens, if it loads, Thanks muchly, if not i’ll be back for more help.

Okay, and it works!

Thanks VERY VERY much for your help.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote=“warlok, post:4, topic:185776”]@ECHO OFF TITLE Silabs Client JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI[/quote]

Now it won’t load at all.

Black screen comes up; Then closes faster than I can say Zomgwtfbbq

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

This is the silab V5 client

This is the Run.bat

@echo off title Silab V5 java -Xmx500m -jar Silab.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 pause

Could you help me a bit more?

Maybe edit that above, so I can run the client?

Or, at least tell me what to do ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

look in your run edit and make sure classpath is right and make sure in run edit it says _04 for jdk 6u4

Read full topic

@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

Hey guys, could anyone help me with this;…

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

Is the error i’m getting when trying to load ANY of the clients i’ve downloaded to play Moparscape/Silab’s servers.

[ul][li]I have the latest JDK / JAVA[/li]
[li]No, I don’t have a rubbish computer.[/li]

Help please?
It’d be great to get back to playing Mopar after a 3 month break!
